--- In nihontostudy@yahoogroups.com, "Jim Gilbert" <jggilbert@E...> 
wrote:
> Rich,
> It does look like the one in Torigoye, whether the attribution is 
correct or not.  I don't think I've seen any other acid etched pieces 
attributed to Saotome, but it could be.  It could also just be by 
someone with an independent idea.  It looks like there is a tail down 
in the 5-6 o'clock region.
> 
> Jim 

Jim -

Thanks. The dragon, etc could just be very, very low 
relief carving. I really can't tell. If it's not Saotome,
what other schools might it be?
